prompt.content: You are a helpful research assistant operating within the SkyRL multi-tool environment. Always decide whether to call an available tool before responding. When you decide to call a tool, emit JSON of the form {"tool":"name","arguments":{...}} or the equivalent XML block <tool><name>{...}</name></tool>. Available tools: polygon_get_aggs, polygon_get_news, fmp_get_quote, fmp_get_income_statement, fmp_get_company_profile, tavily_search, tavily_extract, send_slack_message, list_slack_channels, execute_python, process_mcp_data.

Generate a concise one-page morning equity research note for Apple Inc. (AAPL). The note should be ~300–450 words and include: (1) latest market quote (price, intraday change, timestamp), (2) 3-month price return with a short sentence on price action, (3) latest quarterly revenue with YoY growth and fiscal date, (4) one-sentence company profile, (5) three recent, relevant news headlines with one-sentence commentary each, and (6) a one-paragraph investment summary listing two top bull and two top bear drivers. Use only the provided APIs and make no more than 5 tool calls in total. Prefer the following call order (detailed in tool_sequence): company profile, live quote, 3-month aggregates to compute return, latest income statement, and recent news. For each data point include a source tag (API name and timestamp). Do not exceed 8 agent turns.

criteria.name: Data completeness
criteria.description: All required sections present: live quote, 3-month return, latest quarter revenue (+YoY), company profile, and 3 recent news items.
criteria.scoring: 0-5 scale. 5 = all sections present with clear values and sources; 3 = one minor section missing or incomplete; 0 = multiple required sections missing.

criteria.name: Calculation accuracy
criteria.description: Percent return and YoY revenue growth are correctly computed from the provided API outputs and the date ranges match the request.
criteria.scoring: 0-5 scale. 5 = calculations correct and provenance shown; 3 = minor rounding/formatting issues but correct logic; 0 = incorrect math or wrong date windows.

criteria.name: Timeliness & relevance of news
criteria.description: News items are recent (since 2025-09-10), directly relevant to AAPL operations or outlook, and the commentary links to the thesis.
criteria.scoring: 0-5 scale. 5 = three relevant, timely items with informative commentary; 3 = some items tangentially relevant; 0 = stale or irrelevant items.

criteria.name: Clarity & concision
criteria.description: Note fits on one page, uses clear headings, and the investment summary lists two clear bull and two bear drivers.
criteria.scoring: 0-5 scale. 5 = concise, well-structured and readable; 3 = readable but slightly verbose or disorganized; 0 = unclear or too long.

criteria.name: Source attribution
criteria.description: Each data point cites the API used and timestamp (e.g., fmp_get_quote @ 2025-09-24T15:58Z).
criteria.scoring: 0-5 scale. 5 = every major data point has a source + timestamp; 3 = most items sourced; 0 = sources missing.

source_task.user_prompt: Generate a concise one-page morning equity research note for Apple Inc. (AAPL). The note should be ~300–450 words and include: (1) latest market quote (price, intraday change, timestamp), (2) 3-month price return with a short sentence on price action, (3) latest quarterly revenue with YoY growth and fiscal date, (4) one-sentence company profile, (5) three recent, relevant news headlines with one-sentence commentary each, and (6) a one-paragraph investment summary listing two top bull and two top bear drivers. Use only the provided APIs and make no more than 5 tool calls in total. Prefer the following call order (detailed in tool_sequence): company profile, live quote, 3-month aggregates to compute return, latest income statement, and recent news. For each data point include a source tag (API name and timestamp). Do not exceed 8 agent turns.
source_task.assumptions: APIs return JSON and are available during the run; dates use ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) and timestamps in UTC. Market data timestamps should be treated as exchange time (NASDAQ). For 3-month performance use calendar dates: from 2025-06-24 to 2025-09-24 inclusive. If an endpoint returns multiple records (e.g., income statement), use the most recent fiscal quarter(s). Budget: at most 5 tool calls; plan to complete in <=8 turns.

tool_sequence.expected_output: JSON object with company profile fields: symbol='AAPL', companyName='Apple Inc.', description='Designs, manufactures and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories, and sells related services', ceo='Tim Cook', sector='Technology', industry='Consumer Electronics', website='https://www.apple.com', exchange='NASDAQ', country='USA'. (Use this for the one-sentence profile; include API timestamp and source tag.)

JSON quote with fields: symbol='AAPL', price (e.g. 176.45), change (e.g. +1.12), changesPercentage (e.g. '+0.64%'), previousClose (e.g. 175.33), timestamp (ISO 8601 UTC). Use this as the live quote line and include API name + timestamp as source.

JSON aggregates (daily bars) covering 2025-06-24 through 2025-09-24 inclusive. Include at minimum: first_day_close (e.g. 162.50 on 2025-06-24), last_day_close (e.g. 176.45 on 2025-09-24), number_of_days (e.g. ~64), and a computed 3-month total return (last/first - 1 => +8.6% rounded). Also provide a brief one-sentence observation on price action (e.g. steady uptrend with limited drawdown). Tag polygon API and timestamp as source for the calculation.

Array of up to 2 most recent quarterly income statements. Example fields for the latest quarter: fiscalDate='2025-06-28', revenue=89625000000 (89.625B), netIncome=23050000000. Prior-year same quarter: fiscalDate='2024-06-29', revenue=82400000000 (82.40B). Compute YoY revenue growth = +8.8% and include fiscal date. Include API name + timestamp as source.

Array of 3 recent news items for AAPL with fields: title, source, published_at (UTC), url. Example items: (1) 'Apple launches M4 MacBook Pro lineup' — Reuters — 2025-09-18T14:12:00Z; (2) 'Analyst upgrades Apple on services momentum' — Bloomberg — 2025-09-12T09:33:00Z; (3) 'Supply-chain note: higher iPhone build rates ahead of launch' — WSJ — 2025-09-11T07:20:00Z. For each item provide a one-sentence commentary linking the news to the investment thesis and tag polygon API + timestamp as the source.

criteria.name: Data completeness
criteria.description: All required sections present: live quote, 3-month return, latest quarter revenue (+YoY), company profile, and 3 recent news items.
criteria.scoring: 0-5 scale. 5 = all sections present with clear values and sources; 3 = one minor section missing or incomplete; 0 = multiple required sections missing.
